job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes core software engineering activities: designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining software for a specific product.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
job_tasks.justification: These activities are framed as part of the software development lifecycle for a specific product, not AI model research.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of software components and ensuring quality through testing, which are fundamental software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves working within a software development process (user stories, acceptance tests) to define and test features.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
job_tasks.justification: Paired programming and code reviews are established software engineering practices aimed at improving code quality during development.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the application of established software engineering principles and methodologies to ensure the quality of developed software components.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner
Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement details responsibilities exclusively within Macro-Category A (1.A.1. Software Development & Integration), focusing on designing, developing, and maintaining existing software (NX CAM). No tasks related to AI model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, RAG, or traditional ML are mentioned. The technologies listed are C++ and NX CAM, neither of which are AI/ML specific tools. Therefore, the role is classified as a Software Engineer as it does not involve building or integrating AI/ML into the product, despite the 'AI' in the title.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the tasks involved, which are all standard software engineering activities. The technologies mentioned are also specific and not AI/ML related. While the title includes 'AI', the description of duties and technologies does not support an AI-focused role. The distinction between a Software Engineer and an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer is clear based on the absence of AI/ML integration tasks. The analysis is straightforward based on the provided coding book.
